extends java.lang.Object

Allows a collection of Objects to be loaded from an XML file.

Gets the elements from an XML file with the specified tag names and returns them as a NodeList

Parameters:
Path - the path to the XML file
NodeNames - the names of which tags to get from the XML file
Returns:
the elements from an XML file with the specified tag names as a NodeList
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
org.xml.sax.SAXException

loadIndexEntities

public static <K,V extends XmlUnserializable<K>> java.util.TreeMap<K,V> loadIndexEntities(org.w3c.dom.NodeList nodes,
                                                                                          java.lang.Class<V> entityClass)
                                                                             throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                                    ExistingKeyException
Loads a collection of objects which are instances of a specified class from a NodeList.

Type Parameters:
K - the Data type of the key of the returned collection. Data type is that of the object ID.
V - the Data type of the value of the returned collection. Data type is that of the object itself (specified in entityClass).
Parameters:
nodes - NodeList that collection of objects is loaded from
entityClass - a class which the collection objects will be instances of
Returns:
a collection of objects which are instances of a specified class loaded from a NodeList
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException
java.lang.IllegalAccessException
se3projecta.Model.ExistingKeyException
ExistingKeyException
